title: Luxury Eco-Lodge Stay in Beautiful Sri Lankan Bird Sanctuary
description: Reconnect with nature during a peaceful break glamping at Flameback Eco Lodge - the only hotel nestled into the beautiful Weerawila Bird Sanctuary. This unique property cleverly combines five-star luxury with the natural wonders of the surrounding lake and lush habitat, home to countless native bird species.
